name: Milburt
description:
CONTROLS: Arrow keys and Z

WARNING: The HTML version currently has no sound whatsoever. We STRONGLY recommend the Windows EXE or the cross-platform Love2D version.

The Love2D version can be run on any operating system simply by clicking the .love file after installing Love2D from here: https://love2d.org/

Click here for the HTML version: https://itch.io/embed-upload/4575563?color=000000
